actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 404 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to permits for dredged or fill material.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to stipulate that specified regulations of the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Corps of Engineers, with respect to discharges for dredged or fill material, shall remain in effect for the period ending on the day following final adjournment of the 95th Congress.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 404 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to permits for dredged or fill material.
